title: Light smoked haddock fish pie
description: This healthier fish pie recipe has added texture from golden sliced potatoes layered on top. Each serving provides 400kcal, 35g protein, 47g carbohydrate (of which 6g sugars),	7g fat (of which 2.5g saturates), 5.5g fibre and 1.4g salt.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
3 large potatoes, peeled, par-boiled and sliced
